entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10949
  • [iOS] CollectionView Header gets moved when keyboard or picker show up #10947
  • [iOS] Title is bugged during and after page transition #10945
  • [BUG][Android] Absolute Layout's layout flags and bounds not working in initial loading condition. #10944
    Backlog
  • Multiple Collection Views don't display correctly with visual studio for Mac compiled for Mac Catalyst. #10943
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst app launches multiple windows if previous launch had multiple windows open #10939
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 #10938
  • Clarification required: On screen keyboard #5272 #10922
  • Unable to convert Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.LayoutHandler to UIKit.UIView #10918
  • Label WordWrap does not work inside HorziontalStackLayout or StackLayout with horizontal orientation #10917
    Backlog
  • Image is not rendering correctly with `Aspect` property other than `Center` #10916
    Backlog
  • Setter TargetName="check" Property="Opacity" breaks hot reload #10915
  • [Localization] Binding bug on release mode #10914

Closed

  • GetChild value differs between horizontal and vertical orientation #10921
  • Assembly 'Microsoft.Maui' Version=1.0.0.0 uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=16.0.0.0 which has a higher version than referenced assembly 'Microsoft.iOS' 15.4.300.0 -- FAILED. #10626
  • iOS app fails to appear - dotnet MAUI "cute bot waving" never appears in iOS Window #10880
  • Failed To Build/Publish "Maui Blazor App" In Android Release Mode #10602
  • Grid + CollectionView cause crash #10711
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #10755
  • Android SDK License (ndk-bundle) FAIL #10920

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    t/breaking 💥
  • If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #10946
    area/a11y
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.9 to 1.0.0.10 #10935
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.2 to 1.4.0.3 #10932
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0 to 1.7.0.1 #10930
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.7 to 1.2.1.8 #10929
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1 to 1.5.1.1 #10928
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.14 to 1.0.0.15 #10927
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Shell tab icons size #10924
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS 16] Fix Shell TitleView #10923
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16

Merged

  • [net6] Update sr7 with maestro bumps #10940
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 from 1.0.0.14 to 1.0.0.15 #10934
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1 to 1.3.1.1 #10926
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.2 to 2.5.2.1 #10925
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix minimum sizing for * cells with multiple children #10836
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • Run Android tests on background thread #10841
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨

Updated

  • Bump analyzer for net7 #10892
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #10876
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Extract Maps, Graphics & Foldable docs during build #10909
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
